CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Renate Jaeger
TEXT: CARDINAL . By decisions of ORG adopted DATE ORG Zbagachuvalna Fabryka ' ORG ' ” ( ДВАТ « Центральна збагачувальна фабрика “ PERSON ” PERSON ) was ordered to pay the applicants various amounts in salary arrears and other payments ( see PERSON I for details ) . The decisions in favour of the applicants remain unenforced .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the ORG v. GPE judgment ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
